text:
http sampler is limited 1 level of redirect.
redirects could redirect to other pages.


e.g. http://test/login.do -> http://test/init.do -> http://test/home.do
creator: sys@yahoo.com

text:
See also bug 19004 - allow HTTPSampler to delegate redirection.

Fixing that would allow a suitable protocol handler to deal with all 
redirections. [Don't know whether the latest sun implementation handles 
redirects OK...]
creator: jkb@stian.freeserve.co.uk

text: The default is 10 redirects - should be more than enough.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
